data.company: San José State University, San José, CA
data.title: Instructional Student Assistant

detail.info: Helping professor grading student's assignments, projects, labs, midterms,and final exam.
Explaining challenging topics to student and help them to obtain a better understanding about those topics.
Working together with professor to find out better teaching method based on student feedback.

data.company: Santa Monica College, Santa Monica, CA
data.title: Supplemental Instruction
data.position: SI for CS20A/CS20B - Data Structures with C++/Java

detail.info: Helping student master concept of data structures including, Link-List, Heap, Queue, Binary Tree, Binary Search tree, and AVL Tree.
Helping student to come out their idea to implement data structure including, Link-List, Heap, Queue, Binary Tree, and Binary Search Tree.
Creating mock exams helping student papering their midterms and final exam.

data.company: Santa Monica College, Santa Monica, CA
data.title: Computer Science Tutor
data.position: Tutor for C/C++, Java, Python,Visual Basic, and Assembly Language

detail.info: Helping student mastering fundamental concept of programming including, If-Statement, Loops, Array, and Function.
Helping student mastering concept of object oriented programming including, abstraction, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Helping student to identify bugs and errors in their projects or assignments.
